description: Detects specific combinations of encoding methods in PowerShell via the commandline
author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov (idea)
Vasiliy Burov (rule)
oscd.community
Tim Shelton
name: Potential Encoded PowerShell Patterns In CommandLine
query: (((process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll"))) AND (((process.command_line.text:(*ToInt* OR *ToDecimal* OR *ToByte* OR *ToUint* OR *ToSingle* OR *ToSByte*) AND process.command_line.text:(*ToChar* OR *ToString* OR *String*))) OR ((((process.command_line.text:*char* AND process.command_line.text:*join*)) OR ((process.command_line.text:*split* AND process.command_line.text:*join*))))))
